blogPost.excerpt: Tailscale is a zero config VPN for building secure networks. Install on any device in minutes. Remote access from any network or physical location. Built on WireGuard®.
blogPost.body: Tailscale is a zero config VPN for building secure networks. Install on any device in minutes. Remote access from any network or physical location. Built on WireGuard®.
blogPost.title: Tailscale - A secure network that just works
blogPost.author: Mikael Forsgren

localize.description: Tailscale是一个零配置的VPN，用于构建安全网络。在几分钟内安装在任何设备上。从任何网络或物理位置远程访问。建立在WireGuard®上。
localize.tagline: 一个安全的网络，只是工作

localize.description: Tailscale是一個零配置的VPN，用於構建安全網絡。在幾分鐘內安裝在任何設備上。從任何網絡或物理位置遠程訪問。建立在WireGuard®上。
localize.tagline: 一個安全的網絡，只是工作

previous.excerpt: Ubacast helps creators host, securely stream videos and get paid through: - video channel donations, - video support donations, - video pay per view. Not all creators can earn a living from Ads on YouTube. Think of Ubacast as a Patreon for video creators.
previous.title: Ubacast - Video streaming and monetization. Patreon for video creators

localize.description: Ubacast帮助创作者托管、安全流媒体视频，并通过以下方式获得报酬：-视频频道捐赠，-视频支持捐赠，-视频按次付费。不是所有的创作者都能在YouTube上靠广告谋生。把Ubacast看作是视频创作者的Patreon。
localize.tagline: 视频流和货币化。视频创作者的Patreon

localize.description: Ubacast幫助創作者託管、安全流媒體視頻，並通過以下方式獲得報酬：-視頻頻道捐贈，-視頻支持捐贈，-視頻按次付費。不是所有的創作者都能在YouTube上靠廣告謀生。把Ubacast看作是視頻創作者的Patreon。
localize.tagline: 視頻流和貨幣化。視頻創作者的Patreon

next.excerpt: Papercups EU is an open source live customer chat tool that is hosted in the EU for GDPR compliance purposes. We provide React/React Native/Flutter/HTML chat components for a ton of flexibility and customizability.
next.title: Papercups EU - Open source live chat tool hosted in EU

localize.description: Papercups EU 是一个开源的即时客户聊天工具，出于 GDPR 合规性的目的，它被托管在欧盟。我们提供React/React Native/Flutter/HTML聊天组件，提供大量的灵活性和可定制性。
localize.tagline: 开源的即时聊天工具，托管在欧盟

localize.description: Papercups EU 是一個開源的即時客戶聊天工具，出於 GDPR 合規性的目的，它被託管在歐盟。我們提供React/React Native/Flutter/HTML聊天組件，提供大量的靈活性和可定製性。
localize.tagline: 開源的即時聊天工具，託管在歐盟
